page.title: 02WOODCLOSE FARM,KNEESALL 1
page.content:
MR D.BATES WOODCLOSE FARM KNEESALL NEWARK NOTTS
Mr Bates rents his farm from the{ {Thoresby Estate,}but he does not work for them. He has one hundred and sixteen acres in eleven fields.He thinks the land is grades two and three.It is a bit hard. One of their fields is too hard to plough!He grows two crops,barley and wheat.He also keeps between ninety and one hundred pigs.He bales the straw for the pigs in winter and all the barley is fed to the pigs but the wheat is sold.The breeds of the pigs are{Landrace}and Large white, the sows are crossed with Large white and Landrace but the boars are pure Large white.
